detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ERC20SAP (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20SAP__1.sol#783-808) has payable functions:
	 - ERC20SAP.constructor(string,string,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20SAP__1.sol#784-791)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
